name: The Junkyard (DonPasquale)
description:
Controls:

W/A/S/D: Move
LMB: Shoot
SPACE: Jump
SHIFT: Dash
MOUSEWHEEL: Switch weapons
P/ESC: Pause

Hi!
This time I tried to mix movement-shooter elements with Metroidvania elements. So basically Doom Eternal meets Metroid Prime :D
My plans for this game were big. Too big, in fact. I hopelessly overscoped it, but still tried to pull it off. Since I work full-time besides the jam, I didn't have the time to polish it completely and it lacks content.

Hope you have fun anyways!
Cheers
